result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody Trisk Korth was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Cody Trisk Korth is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Cody Trisk Korth was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:51 a.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Privat has received a copy of the presentence investigation report, states the corrections,  with no additions or deletions.  State has received a copy of the presentence investigation report, with no corrections, additions or deletions.  Statement by DA - no victims.  Sentencing argument by DA.  Sentencing argument by Atty Privat.  Statement by Atty Privat regarding sentence credit - 120 days.  DA concurs.  Statement by defendant.  

Court sentences the defendant to:

2014CF133

6 months county jail, with huber and consecutive to any other sentence.  Sentence is to commence immediately.
$600 fine plus court costs.
D.L. revocation - 2 years
IID - 2 years
AODA

Defendant is to receive credit for 120 days.

2014CF132

6 months county jail, with huber and consecutive to any other sentence.
$600 fine plus court costs.
D.L. revocation for 2 years
IID - 2 years
AODA

2014CF62 & 2014CF106 (EACH)

SWD, and places the defendant on probation for 3 years.

CONDITIONS:

AODA and any follow-up
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Defendant is not to be on any premises that is licensed to sell alcohol by-the-drink.
No contact with any known drug dealers
Defendant is to complete an emotional and mental health assessment and any follow-up
Defendant is to seek or maintain full-time employment.
Court costs.

Court orders the $500 cash bond in 2014CF106 is to be applied to the court costs.

Court adjourned at 12:14 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Cody Trisk Korth
Current: 571 County Road A, C/O Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States  (Effective: 07-14-2015)
Prior: PO Box 132, C/O Columbia County Jail, Portage, WI 53901 United States
Sentencing hearing at 07-20-2015 11:45 am

2:11 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - has filed a motion to dismiss on 2015CM54.  Statement by DA - does not oppose the motion to dismiss.  Statement by the Court in regards to the motion to dismiss and grants the defense motion to dismiss without prejudice.

Statement by Atty Privat in regards to sentencing on the other cases.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  No objection by DA to adjourn.  Court will set for sentencing on July 20, 2015 at 11:45 p.m.

Court adjourned at 2:15 p.m.
Sentencing hearing at 07-14-2015 02:00 pm
to counsel with a copy of the presentence investigation report
to Agent Bret Grant - Court grants the extension to file the PSI.  PSI is due no later than May 27, 2015
from Agent Bret Grant requesting a 7 day extension to file the PSI.
Columbia County Jail - 06/08/2015 at 8:30 a.m. (Sentencing)
Sentencing hearing at 06-08-2015 09:00 am

3:27 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  DA recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 on 2014CF62 with no enhancer; count 1 on 2014CF106; count 2 amended to OWI-3rd offense on 2014CF132 and count 2 amended to OWI-4th offense on 2014CF133.  Atty Privat concurs.  Defendant concurs.  Statement by the Court - will be ordering a PSI on this case and states reasons.  Statement by Atty Privat - defendant will enter a plea today.  Defendant concurs.

2014CF132 - Atty Privat and defendant have received a copy of the amended information and waive reading.  Court goes over penalties.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.  (If felony) Court instructs regarding felony prohibitions.

Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the defendant guilty to count 1 on 2014CF62; count 1 on 2014CF106 and count 2 amended to OWI-3rd offense on 2014CF132 and count 2 amended to OWI-4th offense on 2014CF133.  Court orders the enhancer on 2014CF62, count 3 on 2014CF132 & count 3 on 2014CF133 be dismissed, counts 2 & 3 on 2014CF106, count 1 on 2014CF132 and count 1 on 2014CF133 are to be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.

2014CF133 - Atty Privat and defendant have received a copy of the amended information and waive reading.

Court orders a PSI to be conducted and filed within 60 days.  Sentencing to be scheduled.  

Statement by DA regarding bond.  Court revokes the bond on 2014CF133 and remands the defendant to the custody of the GLSO.

Court adjourned at 3:46 p.m.

2:13 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - has an offer and is not prepared to resolve today as one of the OWI will become a 3rd offense and requests more time.  Court will set for Plea & Sentencing on March 17, 2015 at 3:00 p.m.

2014CF132 & 2014CF133 - Statement by Atty Privat, defendant will waive the prelims.  Defendant concurs.  Court instructs the defendant regarding his right to a preliminary examination.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary examination.  Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial.

State files an information with the court.  Attorney Privat and defendant acknowledge receipt of the informations and waive any reading.  Atty Privat enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant.  



Court adjourned at 2:20 p.m.

By Atty Barb Privat

Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
